data.meta_description: Prints of King Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX) (1927-) and future Queen Sirikit (1932-) whilst still students in Lausanne
data.text:
Mary Evans Picture Library Photo Prints and Wall Art

King Bhumibol Adulyadej and future Queen Sirikit

King Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX) (1927-) and future Queen Sirikit (1932-) whilst still students in Lausanne, Switzerland. Date: 1949. Mary Evans Picture Library makes available wonderful images created for people to enjoy over the centuries. Â© Illustrated London News Ltd/Mary Evans

Media ID 14393252

Adulyadej Bhumibol Bride Girlfriend Intended Lausanne Rama Royals Sirikit Students Swiss Thai Thailand

Framed Prints

Add a touch of royal history to your home or office with our exquisite Framed Prints from Media Storehouse. This captivating image features King Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX) and future Queen Sirikit, captured in a rare moment while they were both students in Lausanne, Switzerland in 1949. The black and white photograph, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, showcases the young couple's radiant smiles and the beginning of their remarkable love story. Our Framed Prints are made to order with museum-quality materials, ensuring the longest-lasting and most beautiful presentation of your artwork. Elevate your space and relive the rich history with this stunning piece of royal memorabilia.

Photo Prints

Adorn your walls with this captivating historical photograph from the Media Storehouse collection. Featuring King Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX) and future Queen Sirikit, this image captures a rare moment in time as they studied together in Lausanne, Switzerland in 1949. Obtained from Mary Evans Prints Online, this rights managed photograph is not only a beautiful addition to any home or office, but also a testament to the rich history of Thailand. Bring the past into your present with this exquisite piece from Media Storehouse.

Poster Prints

"Adorn your walls with history and elegance with our exclusive Media Storehouse Poster Prints featuring the iconic image of His Majesty King Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX) and Her Majesty Queen Sirikit, captured during their student days in Lausanne, Switzerland, in 1949. This timeless photograph, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, showcases the young royal couple's charm and charm, making it a must-have for any collection. Our high-quality poster prints bring the rich history of Thailand to your home or office, blending classic beauty with contemporary style."

Jigsaw Puzzles

Experience the rich history and culture of Thailand with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse. Featuring a captivating image of King Bhumibol Adulyadej (Rama IX) and future Queen Sirikit, taken in 1949 while they were students in Lausanne, Switzerland, this puzzle is a must-have for history enthusiasts and puzzle lovers alike. The high-quality puzzle pieces are made to last, ensuring a fun and engaging experience for all ages. Bring the past to life and create a beautiful display piece with this unique and intriguing puzzle.
